articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google Maps is getting new AI features powered by Gemini - TechCrunch
articles.description: Google Maps is going to start helping you find new places to visit and answer questions about different locations thanks to Gemini.
articles.content: Google Maps is getting new features powered by Gemini, Google’s generative AI model. On Thursday the company announced incoming updates that will allow Google Maps users in the U.S. to tap into AI to… [+2917 chars]
